transcript_full: The story of off of the rat, once upon a time there was a young rat who couldn't make up his mind.  Whenever the other rat says to him if he would like to come out hunting with them,  he would answer in a horse voice, I don't know. And when they said,  would you rather stay inside, he would say yes or no, either.  He'd always shake making your choice.  One fine day, his aunt Josephine said to him, I look here.  No one will ever care for you if you carry on like this.  You have no more mind if you're own and agrees to your old bladed grass.  The young rat coughed and looked wise as usual but said nothing.
